sentence.Network_en: A fellow doesn't last long on what he has done. He's got to keep on delivering as he goes along.--Carl Hubbell, Baseball Player

entry.def: In America, baseball is a game played by two teams of nine players. Each player from one team hits a ball with a bat and then tries to run around three bases and get to the home base before the other team can get the ball back.
A baseball is a small hard ball which is used in the game of baseball.

means.word_mean: 1. a ball game played with a bat and ball between two teams of 9 players; teams take turns at bat trying to score run;

"there was a desire for National League ball in the area"

means.word_mean: 2. a ball used in playing baseball

stems_affixes.word_buile: base低下,基础+born出生→adj.出生低微的
debase降低+ed……的→adj.贬低的;品质恶劣的
base低下,基础+ball球→建立基础打球→垒球
base低下,基础+ment具体物→n.地下室
base低下的+ness表名词→n.卑鄙, 下贱
sub下+base低下,基础→地基下的地基
